t: What Is Amazon Family? - Amazon Customer Service
s: Amazon Family allows you to easily manage all your shared services, subscriptions, and digital content from one place. You can manage profiles or linked accounts to share benefits and control access to services and content for kids and teens. Amazon Family allows you to share Amazon benefits ...

t: What Prime Benefits can Adult Amazon Family Members Share? - Amazon Customer Service
s: Prime members can share select benefits with the other adult in their Amazon Family.

t: Create Your Amazon Family - Amazon Customer Service
s: Note: Your Amazon Family invitees must live in the same country or region as you.

t: Leave an Amazon Family - Amazon Customer Service
s: After you leave an Amazon Family, only the primary Amazon Prime member will keep Amazon Prime benefits. You'll no longer have access to shared content in the Family Library. You can only switch to a new Amazon Family every 12 months.

t: Share Amazon Prime with Your Family - Amazon Customer Service
s: To create an Amazon Family with another adult, select Add Adult. You can either send an email invitation or sign up together to verify your accounts. You and your invitee must agree to share payment methods in order to share Prime benefits.
